project_name.justification: The article is titled 'North Bay Resources Acquires Mt. Vernon Gold Mine, Sierra County, California...'. The authoritative project name is Mt Vernon.

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified as 'North Bay Resources Inc. (the “Company” or “North Bay”) (OTC: NBRI)'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The press release is signed 'On behalf of the Board of Directors of NORTH BAY RESOURCES INC. Jared Lazerson CEO'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states the company entered into an agreement 'to acquire a 100% interest in the Mt. Vernon Mine'.

primary_commodity.justification: The project is referred to as the 'Mt. Vernon Gold Mine' and assays are reported in 'Au Oz./Ton'.

verified_article_link.justification: No verifiable article link was provided in the source text.

currency.justification: The payments are listed with a '$' symbol and the acquiring company is listed on the OTCPK, a US-based exchange, implying USD.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total cash consideration is $10,000,000, calculated by summing the payments outlined in the 'Terms of the Agreement': '$25,000 on signing... $25,000 within 45 days... $500,000 within 90 days... $1,000,000 within 180 days... $1,000,000 within 1 year... $1,000,000 within 2 years... $1,000,000 within 3 years... $1,000,000 within 4 years... $4,450,000 within 5 years...'

share_payments_raw.justification: No shares were issued as part of the acquisition consideration.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Explicit cash payments were itemized, so this field is not applicable.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares were issued as part of the acquisition consideration. The shares mentioned in the 'Corporate Update' are for marketing services, not the project acquisition.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were issued as part of the acquisition consideration.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were issued as part of the acquisition consideration. The options mentioned in the 'Corporate Update' are for marketing services, not the project acquisition.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the acquisition consideration.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters was mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No monetary exploration commitment was mentioned in the text.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The seller retains a royalty, as stated: 'Subsequent to the completion of the Option, the Property will be subject to a 2% Net Smelter Return (the “NSR”).'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states: 'The Property is 120 acres, composed of six 20-acre claims.'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text states: 'The Property is 120 acres, composed of six 20-acre claims.'

resource_size.justification: The text states: 'The ore body is estimated at 954,000 tons based on the known channel...'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The text identifies the buyer as 'North Bay Resources Inc. (the “Company” or “North Bay”) (OTC: NBRI)' and the detailed quote section specifies 'Exchange: OTCPK'.
